name: veteran-funnel
description: React funnel component for Veteran Life Insurance website

scripts.copy-index: cp index.html dist/index.html && sed -i '' 's|<script type="module" src="/src/main.tsx"></script>|<script src="veteran-funnel.iife.js"></script>|g' dist/index.html && sed -i '' 's|<link rel="stylesheet" href="/src/styles/globals.css">|<link rel="stylesheet" href="veteran-funnel.css">|g' dist/index.html
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:emails
